item.description: Wow I cant believe the number of people that said NO..must be the largest number in Meetup.com History. Or this is the worst event i could have ever chosen..yeh it must be this trip... What do you think..40+ noes to only a measily 10 yesses..Cancel the trip ??? NO WAY..the only chickens on theis trip is in the meal....We are going to get wet for sure, the water there is cooling and it should be EXCITING especially if you are up front. Call Crabappel for a possible late cancellation, or trade your space to someone that wants to go real bad but waited to long to reserve, but call them. XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Fridays weather report for sunday at shelbourne falls mass.: Sunday: A slight chance of showers. Patchy fog before 9am. Otherwise, partly cloudy, with a high near 83. Northwest wind between 7 and 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. This looks good enough for me.. Oh even though its warm the water isnt when its on you evaporating, or splashing for that long of a time..wear poly clothes..fast draining/wicking/that kind of stuff.. not cotton..or jeans. the place has wet suits if you want them..i might wear my own own..i think they wash the rental ones..so you know what im thinking.. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx you can ask for a reservation on their cancel list... their number is 1 800 553 (raft) 7238 The Trip is reserved under the name AL -R its 99 bucks for this day...a nice meal is included The Monroe Bridge trip is full of big waves and fast action. The fun starts right after the dam with warm up rapids and then leads to a streach of more challenging class 3 drops such as DEVILS ODDS and LANDSLIDE. Along the way we take time to play and work the river in a SURFING HOLE or 2. Each rapid gets more exciting as the trip builds toward the last and most difficult rapids of the day, DRAGONS TOOTH and the TERMINATOR. These rapids require precise manuevering by the guide and strong paddleing by each rafter through these class 4 rapids climax an awesome day of white water action... $99 prepaid for sunday river trip includes safety instruction, guide, transportation to and from river and a great meal.. Crabapple Whitewater will handle the payment, all i would do is have you reserve under AL R name for reservations.. See their website for more information http://www.crabappleinc.com/ START TIME<(its 9:30) at crab appel and takes about 1 to 1.5 hours to get there from Hartford.. better hit the road between 7:30 and 8 WHERE TO MEET: MEET IN THE LOT of crab appel then LOBBY AT THE PLACE to do the final checkin. 9:30 at crabappel, 9:15, in the lot so you wont be left hi and dry and you can find us. I will put the customary orange cones on the car somewhere. E-Ticket This E-Ticket is non-refundable and non-transferable. <~~~ Now i see the non transferable thing..i dont know how they feel about this but call them.. they are the payment handlers and have the computer thing..i dont... Valid only for dates(s) and river(s) indicated below, and must be presented at check-in E-Ticket# 36822 TRIP INFORMATION Date Trip Name 08/26/2007 DEERFIELD RIVER-MONROE BRIDGE 1 ADULT @ 99.00 99.00 Meeting Time(s): 9:30 <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< THE MEAL Includes a VAMPIRE STEAK, CHICKEN GIZZARDS, OR A FISH GUTS COOKOUT on 08/26 Bring your dentures..but most likely..after the trip..ya wont be able to eat for a week.its gut wrenching and make you scared..... >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> TRIP TOTAL 99.00 Payment Information 07/11/2007(P): $99.00 Sub Total 99.00 Payments Made 99.00 Cancellation Policy If written cancellation is received by Crab Apple Whitewater Inc. 60 days prior to the reservation date, a full refund less $10pp will be given. Cancellations made within 60 days of the activity date are non-refundable. Refunds will not be given for no shows. We encourage you to find a replacement. Monies forfeited may not be applied to any balances that may be due. If Crab Apple Whitewater Inc. cancels an activity a full refund or rain check will be given. Connecticut FROM HARTFORD: Approximate Time 1 1/2 hours?Take I-91 north to Exit 26 in Greenfield, Ma. Go around the rotary and pick up Rte 2 WEST. Our base is about 11 miles west of Greenfield on the left side of Rte 2. For Mapquest, GPS or others, use 2000 Mohawk Trail (sr 2) shelburne falls MA to get you close enough...
